B

Board - Class in <Unnamed>
This class manages the change in each cell.

Second constructor where user can specify the size of the board Sets boardsize to size Fills the entire array with initialized blank cells

C

Cell - Class in <Unnamed>
a single cell of the board that contains information of is the cell revealed, if there is a mine or a flag in the cell, and what number should be displayed on the cell.
Cell() - Constructor for class Cell
First constructor for cell class initializes isMine and isRevealed to false creates a new blank cell that isn't revealed
Cell(boolean) - Constructor for class Cell
Second constructor for cell class initializes isMine to user preference creates either a blank cell or a mine cell isn't revealed
